name: Web Site Crawler
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
tasos
description: Crawl a web site and store information about what was found

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: VHOST
options.description: HTTP server virtual host

options.name: URI
options.description: The starting page to crawl

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: MAX_PAGES
options.description: The maximum number of pages to crawl per URL

options.name: MAX_MINUTES
options.description: The maximum number of minutes to spend on each URL

options.name: MAX_THREADS
options.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests

options.name: HttpUsername
options.description: The HTTP username to specify for authentication

options.name: HttpPassword
options.description: The HTTP password to specify for authentication

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to use for windows authentication

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: DirBust
options.description: Bruteforce common URL paths

options.name: RequestTimeout
options.description: The maximum number of seconds to wait for a reply

options.name: RedirectLimit
options.description: The maximum number of redirects for a single request

options.name: RetryLimit
options.description: The maximum number of attempts for a single request

options.name: UserAgent
options.description: The User-Agent header to use for all requests

options.name: BasicAuthUser
options.description: The HTTP username to specify for basic authentication

options.name: BasicAuthPass
options.description: The HTTP password to specify for basic authentication

options.name: HTTPAdditionalHeaders
options.description: A list of additional headers to send (separated by \x01)

options.name: HTTPCookie
options.description: A HTTP cookie header to send with each request

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: ExcludePathPatterns
options.description: Newline-separated list of path patterns to ignore ('*' is a wildcard)
